definition: to rouse/to be woken by sth/to wake with a start/to sleep lightly
to startle/to be frightened/to be scared/alarm
to wake up/to be awake/to become aware/to sober up/to come to

sentences.english: The mother tiptoed into the room for fear that she should wake up her sleeping baby.
sentences.chinese: 母親踮起腳尖走進房間，惟恐驚醒正在熟睡的寶寶。

sentences.english: Bear woke up with a start and pulled his long tail hard as he could.
sentences.chinese: 熊被驚醒過來，開始使勁地拉尾巴。

sentences.english: He was started out of his horrible dream by my ringing.
sentences.chinese: 我給他打電話的鈴聲，使他從噩夢中驚醒過來。

sentences.english: At about four o'clock, the roustabouts are roused by the sound of seabirds.
sentences.chinese: 四點左右，海鳥的叫聲將使水手從夢中驚醒。

sentences.english: He woke up from a nightmare, trembling with fear.
sentences.chinese: 他從噩夢中驚醒，因爲恐懼而嚇得發抖。

sentences.english: Shouted the old black females was such a big deal, the front of the neighbors were awakened.
sentences.chinese: 老黑母兔這麼一喊不要緊，把跟前的鄰居們都驚醒了。

sentences.english: A large movement shocked me from my morbid contemplation.
sentences.chinese: 一個很大的動靜將我從這種病態的沉思中驚醒過來。

sentences.english: Sometimes at midnight when sudden moment wake up from any bad dream or any, Listen music-think definitely can sleep again (sound sleep).
sentences.chinese: 當夜半忽因惡夢驚醒，聽這個音樂就可安然入睡。

sentences.english: Four hours later, Mr. Philippi says he woke with a start.
sentences.chinese: 四小時後，Phhilippi先生說他驚醒了。

sentences.english: Suddenly, a whistle startled the goddess .
sentences.chinese: 突然，一聲長嘯驚醒了沉睡的女神。

sentences.english: You drift off to sleep and next thing you know, it sounds like a lumberyard.
sentences.chinese: 你睡着瞭然後被驚醒，那就像木場裏鋸木發出的聲音。

sentences.english: He woke up and punched me in the face.
sentences.chinese: 結果他驚醒了，手一彈打在我臉上。

sentences.english: I snap awake every morning promptly at six-thirty, feeling disorientated and frightened.
sentences.chinese: 我每天早上六點半便驚醒了，感到茫然和害怕。

sentences.english: The man's cry aroused the town watch.
sentences.chinese: 那人的喊叫聲驚醒了鎮上的值夜人。

sentences.english: And I am a light sleeper. The least sound awakens me.
sentences.chinese: 我睡覺時很容易驚醒的，一點點聲音都會驚醒我。

sentences.english: And I am a light sleeper. The least sound awakens me.
sentences.chinese: 我睡覺時很容易驚醒的，一點點聲音都會驚醒我。

definition: to startle/to be frightened/to be scared/alarm
to realize suddenly/to wake up with a start
to wake up from a sleep
to faint/to swoon/to black out/to become unconscious
to close (a door)/to turn off (light, electrical equipment etc)
